# usesInspectorBar

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether this text view uses the inspector bar.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var usesInspectorBar: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The inspector bar displays text formatting controls, much like those in iWork applications, which can be used in place of the formatting controls in the ruler accessory view.

## Using text formatting controls

- **usesRuler**: A Boolean value that controls whether the text views sharing the receiver’s layout manager use a ruler.
- **isRulerVisible**: A Boolean value that controls whether the scroll view enclosing text views sharing the receiver’s layout manager displays the ruler.
